attributes.action: Sleazy MPs and Lords cannot be associated with political parties but can continue to be paid to represent their constituencies, tell us why that is.
attributes.additional_details: The political party system in this country is second only to the EU Commission in  levels of absolute monetary corruption.  Sleazy MPs and Lords are forced to resign their respective Whips but the people who elected them are obliged to continue to deal with them, knowing they are corrupted and have been proved to be corrupt in their representation.  There has to be a reason for these double standards and Mr Cameron is the man to tell us.
